script.dialog: |wave|Little Robot!|norm||L||!|You are just the robot that I wanted to see.
Hold on to that thought.|L||!|This Unit has detected another new type of |C3|gift.
They really spoil me too much.
This Unit will now explain |C3|Quick Gifts.
Some monsters will now have |C3|Quick Gifts|C0| for you.
Having more |C3|karma|C0| will also increase the chance of finding them.
Unlike the other gift types, |C3|Quick Gifts|C0| do not take effect automatically.
Instead, |C3|Quick Gifts|C0| must be activated before starting a battle.
The effects of a |C3|Quick Gift|C0| will wear off after the number of battles denoted on the gift.
Many of them will only last a single battle.
You can only hold and activate a limited amount of |C3|Quick Gifts.
Monsters will not have any |C3|Quick Gifts|C0| for you if you are already holding too many.
|C3|Suggestion:|C0| Do not forget to use any |C3|Quick Gifts|C0| that you receive.
Thank you Little Robot!|L||!|I'll be sure to use them.
On to other matters, why did this Zaraden want to see This Unit?
Oh, I have something very important to tell you.
This Unit is experiencing a sudden rise in temperature.|L||!|All cooling fans are failing.
